entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TextColor of RadioButton seems to be always black for Mac Catalyst, despite setting it in constructor with e.g. new RadioButton { TextColor = Color.FromRgb(255, 0, 0), ... } #6430
  • ViewHandler mapper extension methods won't reliably fire if mapper methods are replaced #6429
    6.0.300
  • Resizetizer rotates large images #6426
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Blazor template (WinUI 3) does not display WebView2 Runtime download link #6421
    6.0.300
  • Grid doesn't dynamically size when content size changes #6420
  • Adding an image file to Resources/Images folder gets incorrectly set as AndroidResource Build Action #6418
  • Light up .NET MAUI Item Templates for .NET MAUI Solution #6416
    6.0.300-servicing
  • DeviceTest: InvalidImageSourceFailsToLoad needs to be fixed and re-enabled #6415
    .NET 7
  • [iOS] Width or height of Editor control can't be set #6414
  • Inconsistent behavior with RTL flow direction for custom layout #6413
  • Vertical Scrolling is hard/Practically unusable for a CollectionView inside a CarouselView #6412
  • A single way to override the back button behavior #6410
  • FlyoutPage issues on macOS #6408
  • RC1 - NumberOfTapsRequired fails when greater than 2 (Xamarin.Forms legacy issue) #6407
  • Shell.TitleView not working on Android and have issues on Iphone #6406
  • ViewModel in Page .NET MAUI RC1 - Signed apk installed in device. #6405
  • (Windows) RC1 - RefreshView does not appear when swiping down with mouse #6404
  • [iOS] DatePicker does not display initial value #6402
  • (Windows) RC1 - SwipeView - Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt #6401
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • (Windows) RC1 - LayoutCycleException when maximizing window #6400
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Shell.NavBarHasShadow is not working #6399
  • "\bin\Debug\net6.0-windows10.0.19041\win10-x64\xxxxx.appxrecipe" is missing or malformed. #6398
  • After installing .NET 7 preview everything MAUI related disappears #6396
  • Run on iOS Physical Device - error MT1216: Could not find the simulator UDID #6395
  • Blazor Hybrid Publishing Validation #6393
    6.0.300

Closed

  • Grid within a Grid is not size constrained correctly #4724
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [mauipalooza] Layout width is wrong and elements are misaligned #5949
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Strange Picker behaviour when used in NavigationPage #2349
    6.0.300
  • Please add FontIcon #3894
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor of ContentPage not being updated on AppThemeBinding update #5681
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android 11] Behavior does not modify properties of attached object when modification occurs in an EventHandler #4516
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • AppThemeBinding not working (p11/p12) #4335
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Custom theme ResourceDictionary not working #4143
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Image binding not updating on iOS #1086
    6.0.300
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on native apps #6067
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • StreamImageSource doesn't work on Image Control #6231
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Large Images Not Shown Correctly #5938
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MAUI Hot Reload Not Working in VS 2022 17.2.0 Preview 3 #6403
  • Application.Current.Windows maintains incorrect count #6103
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Publishing a Windows app doesn't produce an msix #5884
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Embedded images not render in Android Maui #6228
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Changing Label Value at Runtime makes the label invisible #6100
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • TabbedPage running on Android Emulator - Unhandled Exception #6349
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Clearing BindableProperty causes styles properties to disappear #4617
    6.0.300-rc.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid iOS Safe Areas #6432
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300
  • Fix viewcell margins on listview #6431
  • Use control template for PresentedContent on a ContentPage, if available #6428
  • Tweak template styles some more #6425
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.100-preview.2.22102.8 to 7.0.100-preview.5.22222.1 #6424
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update ShellToolBar when applicable appearance elements change #6422
  • Fix AmbigousMatchException between duplicated types Core and Controls #6409
    t/bug

Merged

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220422212458770 to loc #6427
  • Fix the BackgroundColor to Background update #6372
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Add VC Redist dependency to Windows templates #6318
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Allow closing of windows when using a MainPage #6316
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Generate MSIX when publishing #6262
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [resizetizer] non-vector images should not resize by default #6419
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Use a different property name for dependabot #6423
  • Use a variable for the Svg.* package versions #6355
  • Fix android image loading into views #6394
    platform/android 🤖, control-image, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Throw exception if users uses incompatible pages #6390
    area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Properly restore styleValue after ClearValue #6379

Updated

  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Fix crash using SwipeView inside CollectionView #6220
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • Fix FlyoutIsPresented permutations #6388
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Add Geolocation iOS14+ Reduced Accuracy Support #5826
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Adds FlowDirection Design TypeConverter #6384
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.12.1 to 0.13.1 #6352
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Svg2VectorDrawable.Net from 0.1.0 to 0.3.0 #6265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Core] Fix issue not finding IAnimationManager #6364
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬
  • [Housekeeping | Windows] Revert changes in Button focus default behavior #6234
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-button
  • Correctly render Shape Background (and BackgroundColor) #5994
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix issues rendering gradients and CornerRadius on Button #5971
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Not render shadows on without a ShadowColor #6191
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix ArcSegment rendering #6264
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Updated Default project template title #6319
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [Android] Fix crash in TabbedPage (using it under Shell) #6374
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
    do-not-merge
